mapper.update: update overp set status = 1 where id = #{id} and pid = #{pid}
update overp set status = -1 where id = #{id} and pid = #{pid}
mapper.select: select id,overp.pid,overp.status,problem.sid,special.sname,overp.title from overp join problem on overp.pid=problem.pid join special on problem.sid=special.sid WHERE id = #{id}
select count(status) from overp where id = #{id} and status = 1
select count(status) from overp where id = #{id} and status = -1
select count(status) from overp where id = #{id} and status = 0

select username,ac from (select username,max(ac) as ac from user natural join (select id,count(status) as ac from overp where status = 1 group by id) as A group by username) as C where ac in (select max(ac) as ac from user natural join (select id,count(status) as ac from overp where status = 1 group by id) as b);
